          <title>
            <string language="en">Formation of poly(ethene)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Anordnung von poly(ethene)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Formation de poly(ethene)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Formação do poly(ethene)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Formazione di poly(ethene)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σχηματισμός πολυ (ethene)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Formación del poly(ethene)</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows that the long molecule of poly(ethene) is formed when lots of small ethene molecules join together.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">ethene</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">hydrocarbons</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">molecules</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">poly(ethene)</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">polymers</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt, daß das lange Molekül 
von poly(ethene) gebildet wird, wenn Lots kleine ethene Moleküle 
zusammen verbinden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration prouve que la longue molécule
du poly(ethene) est formée quand un bon nombre de petites molécules 
d'ethene se joignent ensemble.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra que a molécula longa do
poly(ethene) está dada forma quando os lotes de moléculas pequenas 
do ethene juntam junto.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione indica che la molecola lunga
di poly(ethene) è formata quando i lotti di piccole molecole del 
ethene si uniscono insieme.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση δείχνει ότι το μακρύ μόριο πολυ 
(ethene) διαμορφώνεται όταν ενώνουν από κοινού τα μέρη των 
μικρών μορίων ethene.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra que la molécula larga 
del poly(ethene) está formada cuando las porciones de moléculas 
pequeñas del ethene ensamblan juntas.</string>
          </description>

          </keyword>
